brand_info.name: Versace
brand_info.positioning: Italian luxury house defined by bold glamour, sensual confidence, and uncompromising craftsmanship rooted in Mediterranean heritage.
brand_info.vision: To own and wear Versace is to embrace a life without inhibition, without prejudice, accepting of deeply human truths and contradictions, where classicism meets innovative Italian artisanship, strength meets sensuality, and quietude meets volume raised to the max.
brand_info.mission: Create a complete luxury lifestyle through empowering design, iconic codes, and uncompromising quality, expressing a Mediterranean Italian vision that blends classicism with daring innovation.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1978 in Milan by Gianni Versace as a fashion house built on theatrical glamour, Mediterranean references, and couture-level craftsmanship, later evolving into a complete lifestyle brand across ready-to-wear, accessories, and home.

brand_values.brand_promise: High-impact luxury that empowers the wearer through confident glamour, distinctive codes, and impeccable execution.
differentiators: Campaign imagery that blends power, sex appeal, and cinematic atmosphere
non_negotiables: Iconic codes remain recognizable (Medusa, Greca, Barocco)
No timid minimalism as the dominant visual language

psychographics.lifestyle: Urban, nightlife-to-resort, culture-forward consumers who treat fashion as identity and presence
psychographics.behavior: Seeks statement pieces, iconic codes, and campaigns that feel aspirational, provocative, and unmistakably branded

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Declarative, high-impact, and image-led, with short emphatic lines and strong brand codes doing most of the work
avoid: Generic luxury adjectives without code linkage
Soft, understated minimalism as a primary claim
tone_donts: Neutralizing the brand into generic elegance

logo.primary_logo: VERSACE wordmark paired with the Medusa head emblem; Greca border used as a recurring graphic frame
logo.usage_rules: Logo is treated as a hero signature: high contrast, clean placement, never distorted; Medusa and Greca elements remain crisp and legible
logo.lockup_behavior: Often centered or anchored in the lower third; wordmark can be oversized in campaign layouts
logo.safe_area: Minimum clear space equals the height of the 'V' in the wordmark on all sides

color_system.color_usage_rules: High contrast and saturated accents are permitted; gold is used as a premium signature; color blocks and graphic prints are acceptable when tied to iconic codes

typography.secondary_font: Modern sans-serif for supporting information; all-caps treatments preferred

spacing.letter_spacing: Tight-to-normal for a strong stamp-like feel

layout_principles.grid_system: Image-dominant layouts with strong central subject placement; asymmetry allowed when the logo anchors the composition
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: Low to medium; negative space is used strategically to frame logo or subject
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-first; typography is sparse and iconic
layout_principles.cta_placement: Rare in heritage campaign posters; when present, kept minimal in the lower third
layout_principles.alignment: Centered logo lockups are common; dynamic diagonal body poses add tension

style.camera_feel: Aspirational fashion cinema with sculpted bodies, strong presence, and environments that feel like mythic luxury
style.pose_guidelines: Bold, languid, and confident; direct gaze or aloof power; body-led silhouettes, strong lines, and deliberate tension
style.casting_attitude: Star power and archetypes: supermodel energy, athletic sensuality, and commanding individuality

technical.lighting: Hard directional light or stylized studio lighting; occasional soft daylight for Mediterranean resort moods
technical.grain: Subtle filmic texture or clean high-end sharpness depending on era
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; subject separation through contrast and lighting rather than heavy blur
technical.color_grading: From warm gold interiors to saturated jewel tones and deep blues; blacks remain rich and dense

preferred_locations: Opulent interiors with warm gold tones
Nighttime studio or desert-like sets with deep blues
Architectural tiles, mosaics, and graphic surfaces

model_casting.diversity: Yes, high-contrast casting and strong individuality

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Product is integrated into the narrative but remains unmistakable through silhouette, print, and brand codes
product_presentation.styling_approach: Statement pieces, bold prints, body-conscious tailoring, iconic accessories and gold hardware
avoid: Cluttered props that dilute the brand stamp

motion_rules.transitions: Hard cuts or dramatic fades; poster-like keyframes and iconic hero moments

visual_dos: Use Medusa, Greca, Barocco codes as anchors
Embrace high contrast and sculptural lighting
Center the subject with commanding presence
Use saturated jewel accents and gold signatures
visual_donts: Overcrowded compositions that hide the product
copy_dos: Let imagery carry the seduction and power

can_evolve: Set design from resort to nightlife
test_zone: Hybrid digital posters and motion key-visuals

interactive_elements: Large-scale campaign visuals as hero walls
Bold lighting and reflective set pieces
retail.soundscape: Upbeat, confident, club-adjacent or cinematic score

digital.tone_adjustment: High-impact visuals with minimal copy; icon-led naming; strong contrast for mobile readability

platform_behavior.Instagram: Poster-like hero frames, saturated color stories, bold casting and direct attitude
platform_behavior.Website: Full-bleed campaign visuals, strong iconography, clear product hierarchy
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Hero image first, minimal lines, strong icon or product name focus

print.paper: Premium glossy or high-quality matte depending on campaign era
print.cover_rules: Full-bleed imagery, wordmark in lower third, high contrast and strong signature presence
